definition: to ferment/to brew/to make honey (of bees)/to lead to/to form gradually/wine/stuffed vegetables (cooking method)

sentences.english: My favorite beer is from a microbrewery.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜歡的啤酒是一家小釀酒廠出產的。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is feasible to make liquor using machine-compressed wrapped starters with waste lees.
sentences.chinese: 因此，機壓丟糟包包曲用於釀酒生產是可行的。

sentences.english: The works at the winery led to the re-thinking of the external space.
sentences.chinese: 釀酒廠的工作引發了對內部空間的重新思考。

sentences.english: GPI anchoring of proteins is essential for the growth of Saccharomuces cerevisiae.
sentences.chinese: GPI化蛋白對釀酒酵母的生長來說是必需的。

sentences.english: The application of calcium alginate immobilized method in brewing yeast cell.
sentences.chinese: 研究了海藻酸鈣固定化技術在釀酒酵母上的應用。

sentences.english: Vacuolar acidification under high hydrostatic pressure in saccharomyces cerevisiae.
sentences.chinese: 高靜水壓下釀酒酵母的空泡酸化。

sentences.english: The Bodega has modern winemaking installations.
sentences.chinese: 該酒窖擁有現代化的釀酒設備。

sentences.english: On friday they added reliever grant balfour in a trade with the brewers.
sentences.chinese: 週五對他們補充救濟補助貝爾福在貿易與釀酒。

sentences.english: Another goal is to make the bugs quicker at breaking down the brewery waste.
sentences.chinese: 另一個目的就是能夠讓這些菌類更快地分解釀酒殘渣。

sentences.english: There are also many microbreweries, two of which have their own restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 當地還有許多小型釀酒廠，其中兩家擁有附屬餐廳。

sentences.english: Steam Whistle's Czech brewmaster asked for a bedroom at the brewery.
sentences.chinese: 公司的那位捷克裔釀酒大師就要求在廠裏置一間臥室。

sentences.english: The more ethanol produced, the growth circle of Saccharomyces cerevisiae was larger.
sentences.chinese: 產生的乙醇越多，指示菌釀酒酵母的生長圈相對越大。

sentences.english: The replicative lifespan of Saccharomyces cerevisiae is determined by both genetic and environmental factors.
sentences.chinese: 在複製的釀酒酵母的壽命是由遺傳和環境因素。

sentences.english: So, his job was the management of the cellars and wine making.
sentences.chinese: 所以，他的工作是管理酒窯程釀酒。

sentences.english: The winery, however, is the other side of the mountain near Beirut.
sentences.chinese: 然而，釀酒廠卻位於靠近貝魯特的山的另一邊。

sentences.english: The Balduzzi family hails from Italy where its experience of wine production dates back to 1706.
sentences.chinese: 碧桃絲家族來自意大利自十七世紀已開始釀酒的事業。

definition: to brew/to make (wine, vinegar, soybean paste etc) by fermentation
to produce (by natural growth, or by manufacture, mining etc)/to yield/to turn out/produce/products
to taste a small amount/to sample
to concoct by mixing ingredients/to prepare according to a recipe/to make (a salad, a cocktail, cosmetics etc)
to ferment/to brew/to make honey (of bees)/to lead to/to form gradually/wine/stuffed vegetables (cooking method)
